meanings.definition: Oghams: an ancient Irish alphabet consisting of a series of notches or lines for communication
meanings.sent1: The ancient oghams were used by the Irish for writing messages.
meanings.sent2: Scholars study the oghams to understand ancient Irish communication.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous leprechaun left a trail of oghams for the curious children to decipher.
meanings.sent4: The oghams carved on the stone seemed to whisper secrets of the past.
meanings.sent5: The intricate oghams etched on the tree bark told stories of old battles.

meanings.definition: Oghams: the inscriptions or writings made using the ogham alphabet
meanings.sent1: Archaeologists discovered ancient oghams inscribed on the tomb walls.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed the oghams found in the ancient ruins.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous leprechaun left a trail of oghams for the curious children to decipher.
meanings.sent4: The oghams carved on the stone seemed to whisper secrets of the past.
meanings.sent5: The intricate oghams etched on the tree bark told stories of old battles.

meanings.definition: Oghams: a system of writing used in early medieval Ireland and Britain
meanings.sent1: The oghams were crucial for recording historical events in medieval times.
meanings.sent2: Students learn about the oghams in their history class.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous leprechaun left a trail of oghams for the curious children to decipher.
meanings.sent4: The oghams carved on the stone seemed to whisper secrets of the past.
meanings.sent5: The intricate oghams etched on the tree bark told stories of old battles.
